trans-unit.source: Deliver parcel to the train station post office.
trans-unit.target: 把包裹送到火车站邮局。

trans-unit.source: Host the event in one of your White Ash Harbor restaurants.
trans-unit.target: 在白灰港餐厅举办活动。

trans-unit.source: Host the event in one of your Billboard City restaurants.
trans-unit.target: 在Billboard City的一家餐厅举办活动。

trans-unit.source: (npc) is hosting a party and requires ingredients to make a special snack.
trans-unit.target: (npc)正在举办一个聚会，需要食材来制作一种特殊的小吃。

trans-unit.source: (npc) wants to cook a dish for a friend and (pronoun_D) wants you to find a special ingredient.
trans-unit.target: (npc)想为朋友做一道菜，(pronoun_D)想让你找到一种特殊的配料。

trans-unit.source: (npc) wants to try out a new dish and requires some ingredients.
trans-unit.target: (npc)想尝试一道新菜，需要一些食材。

trans-unit.source: (npc) is making a present for a friend and needs a rare item to finish (pronoun_P) project.
trans-unit.target: (npc)正在为朋友做礼物，需要一件稀有物品来完成(pronoun_P)项目。

trans-unit.source: Collect a rare item to add to (npc)'s collection.
trans-unit.target: 收集一件稀有物品添加到(npc)的收藏中。

trans-unit.source: (npc) wants to make a gift for a friend in Billboard City and (pronoun_D) needs a special item to create it.
trans-unit.target: (npc)想要为广告牌城的一位朋友制作一份礼物，但需要一件特殊的物品来制作(pronoun_D)。

trans-unit.source: (npc) is craving your restaurant's (dishname). Prepare a takeout order for (npc).
trans-unit.target: (npc) 很想吃您餐厅的 (dishname)。为(npc)准备一份外卖订单。

trans-unit.source: (npc) wants to spend the day relaxing, but (pronoun_D) cannot do it without your famous (dishname).
trans-unit.target: (npc)想要度过轻松的一天，但是(pronoun_D)没有你著名的(dishname)就无法做到这一点。

trans-unit.source: (npc) wants to spend a day at the beach, and hopes to have your famous (dishname) to accompany (pronoun_P).
trans-unit.target: (npc)想在海滩上度过一天，并希望有你著名的(dishname)陪伴(pronoun_P)。

trans-unit.source: (npc) is hosting a small party and would really love an order of your (dishname).
trans-unit.target: (npc)正在举办一个小型聚会，非常想订购您的(dishname)。

trans-unit.source: (npc) is going up for a hike in the mountains and would like an order of your famous (dishname).
trans-unit.target: (npc)要去山里徒步旅行，想点一份您著名的(dishname)。

trans-unit.source: (npc) wants to send a care package to (pronoun_P) family in Billboard City.
trans-unit.target: (npc)想要给 Billboard City 的(pronoun_P)家人寄送一份爱心包裹。

trans-unit.source: Help deliver (npc)'s parcel of clothes for the children's shelter. What a good samaritan!
trans-unit.target: 帮助将(npc)的衣服包裹送到儿童收容所。真是个好心人！

trans-unit.source: (npc) needs help returning (pronoun_P) Omozone order, which was damaged during shipping.
trans-unit.target: (npc)需要帮助退回 Omozone 订购的(pronoun_P)，该食品在运输过程中受损。

trans-unit.source: (npc) has made a gift-wrapped present for (pronoun_P) idol in Billboard City.
trans-unit.target: (npc)为Billboard City的(pronoun_P)偶像制作了一份礼品包装礼物。

trans-unit.source: Help deliver (npc)'s wrapped gift to a pen pal in Billboard City. Who could it be?
trans-unit.target: 帮(npc)将包装好的礼物送给 Billboard City 的笔友。他会是谁？

trans-unit.source: (animal)s are swarming the beaches of White Ash Harbor. Reduce their population and keep them away from beachgoers.
trans-unit.target: (animal)群涌入白灰港海滩。请消灭它们并让它们远离海滩上的游客。

trans-unit.source: (animal)s have been venturing past the beach boundary and have snuck into peoples' homes. Drive back the (animal) invasion.
trans-unit.target: (animal)已经越过海滩边界，偷偷溜进人们的家中。击退(animal)的入侵。

trans-unit.source: (animal)s have been ravaging the countryside and are damaging the local farms. Hunt (animal)s to protect the crops.
trans-unit.target: (animal)肆虐乡村，破坏当地农场。猎杀(animal)以保护庄稼。

trans-unit.source: Recently, tourists have been attacked and injured by enraged (animal)s. Reduce their population to prevent further attacks.
trans-unit.target: 最近，游客遭到愤怒的(animal)袭击和伤害。减少他们的数量以防止进一步的袭击。

trans-unit.source: (animal)s have been ambushing people in the deep woods without warning. Defeat (animal)s to prevent more attacks.
trans-unit.target: (animal)在没有任何警告的情况下，一直在深林中伏击人们。击败(animal)以防止更多攻击。

trans-unit.source: (npc) wants to make a bet with an experienced hunter. Defeat (animal)s within the time limit to win a prize.
trans-unit.target: (npc)想和一位经验丰富的猎人打赌。在规定时间内击败(animal)赢得奖品。

trans-unit.source: (animal)s are destroying the crops in Takashi Farms. Reduce their population to protect the crops.
trans-unit.target: (animal)正在摧毁高市农场的庄稼。减少人口以保护农作物。

trans-unit.source: (npc) wants to make a bet with an experienced hunter. Hunt (animal)s within the time limit to win a prize.
trans-unit.target: (npc)想和一位经验丰富的猎人打赌。在规定时间内狩猎(animal)以赢取奖品。

trans-unit.source: (npc) wants to host a fun little party for (pronoun_P) friends in White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: (npc)想在白灰港为(pronoun_P)朋友举办一个有趣的小聚会。

trans-unit.source: (npc) is hosting a fan party for a famous musician, and wants a cozy setting with good food and drinks.
trans-unit.target: (npc)正在为一位著名音乐家举办粉丝派对，并希望有一个舒适的环境，有美味的食物和饮料。

trans-unit.source: It's the weekend, which means it's the perfect time for a big BBQ to celebrate. (npc) needs a lively setting with a great meat menu.
trans-unit.target: 现在是周末，这正是举行大型烧烤庆祝的最佳时机。 (npc)需要一个热闹的场所和一份丰富的肉类菜单。

trans-unit.source: (npc) wants to host a meetup to chat about all things technology and gaming. Provide a suitable setting for (pronoun_P) guests to enjoy themselves.
trans-unit.target: (npc)想举办一次聚会，聊聊科技和游戏方面的所有事情。为(pronoun_P)的客人提供合适的环境，让他们尽情享受。

trans-unit.source: It's (npc)'s birthday. (pronoun_P) would love to party the day away and drink away (pronoun_P) sorrows and regrets.
trans-unit.target: 今天是(npc)的生日。(pronoun_P)很想开派对度过这一天，用喝酒来消除(pronoun_P)的悲伤和遗憾。

trans-unit.source: It's (npc)'s turn to host a gathering for the Polite Society. (npc) politely requests an elegant setting with some comfort foods.
trans-unit.target: 现在轮到(npc)为礼貌协会举办聚会了。(npc)礼貌地请求一个优雅的场所和一些舒适的食物。

trans-unit.source: (npc) is hungry and wants to have a big feast for (pronoun_F) and (pronoun_P) family. Create a grand feast for (npc).
trans-unit.target: (npc)饿了，想为(pronoun_F)和(pronoun_P)一家人办一顿大餐。为(npc)准备一顿丰盛的宴席。

trans-unit.source: (npc) loves sweets wants to invite (pronoun_P) friends for a cozy tea party.
trans-unit.target: (npc)喜欢甜食，想邀请(pronoun_P)朋友参加舒适的茶会。

trans-unit.source: (npc) wants to host a seafood feast for (pronoun_P) fellow fishermen. Create a lively feast centered around seafood.
trans-unit.target: (npc)想为(pronoun_P)渔民举办一场海鲜盛宴。以海鲜为中心，打造一场热闹的盛宴。
令人愉快的素食主义者

trans-unit.source: (npc) would like to have a party for (pronoun_P) vegan friends. Ideally, this party would be hosted in a room with a modern decor.
trans-unit.target: (npc)想为(pronoun_P)素食主义者朋友举办一个聚会。理想情况下，这个聚会将在一个装饰现代的房间里举行。

trans-unit.source: The Frozen Fanatics are an elite culinary group that travel around the globe to eat frozen foods. (npc) is a member and it's (pronoun_P) turn to host their next gathering.
trans-unit.target: 冷冻狂热者是一个精英烹饪团体，他们环游世界吃冷冻食品。(npc)是一名成员，现在轮到(pronoun_P)主持他们的下一次聚会。

trans-unit.source: (npc) has been feeling down lately and would to to enjoy a private meal at one of your restaurants.
trans-unit.target: (npc)最近情绪低落，想在你们的一家餐厅享用一顿私人晚餐。
葡萄酒鉴赏家还是酒鬼？

trans-unit.source: (npc) would like to host a cocktail party for (pronoun_P) fellow amateur alcohol connoisseurs. Provide a nice drink menu and a hip setting.
trans-unit.target: (npc)想为(pronoun_P)业余酒精鉴赏家举办一场鸡尾酒会。提供精美的饮料菜单和时尚的环境。

trans-unit.source: Return to (npc) to claim your reward.
Meet the locals and learn about gathering ingredients. Open Le Sequoia for the first time and prepare a meal for Hasel.
trans-unit.target: 与当地人见面，了解如何收集食材。第一次打开Le Sequoia，为Hasel准备一顿饭。

trans-unit.source: Speak to Uriel the butcher about acquiring meats.
trans-unit.target: 和屠夫乌列尔谈谈买肉的事。

trans-unit.source: Speak to farmer May Lou about gathering vegetables.
trans-unit.target: 和农民梅楼谈谈种菜的事。

trans-unit.source: Speak to fruit seller Nabiha to learn about fruits.
trans-unit.target: 与水果销售商纳比哈交谈，了解水果。

trans-unit.source: Speak to fisherman Aloys to learn about fishing.
trans-unit.target: 与渔夫Aloys交谈，了解钓鱼知识。

trans-unit.source: Speak to Thelio to learn about baking supplies.
Return to Hasel at Le Sequoia Restaurant.
Set up the restaurant by meeting the requirements and prepare a meal for Hasel.
trans-unit.target: 按照要求开设餐厅，并为Hasel准备一顿饭。

trans-unit.source: You have completed your first service. Speak to Hasel outside.
trans-unit.target: 您已经完成了第一次服务。跟外面的哈塞尔谈谈。

trans-unit.source: The refrigerator of Le Sequoia is old and small. Have Bianca help you upgrade the refrigerator with a new one.
trans-unit.target: 乐红杉的冰箱又旧又小。让比安卡帮你把冰箱换成新的。

trans-unit.source: Speak to Bianca to fix the refrigerator.
trans-unit.target: 和比安卡谈谈修理冰箱。

trans-unit.source: Bianca can help you but she needs you to retrieve an item from Thelio.
trans-unit.target: 比安卡可以帮你，但她需要你从忒里奥那里取回一件物品。

trans-unit.source: Delivery the box of sweets back to Bianca and she will help you with the fridge.
trans-unit.target: 把这盒糖果还给比安卡，她会帮你拿冰箱的。

trans-unit.source: Bianca is heading over to Le Sequoia to fix the refrigerator. Meet her there.
trans-unit.target: 比安卡正前往Le Sequoia修理冰箱。在那里见她。

trans-unit.source: Host a soft opening of Le Sequoia for a small group of White Ash harbor residents.
trans-unit.target: 为白灰港的一小群居民举办Le Sequoia的试营业。

trans-unit.source: Hasel will gather up some locals to attend the soft opening. Prepare the restaurant for the soft opening and wait until the next day to speak to her.
trans-unit.target: 哈塞尔将召集一些当地人参加试营业。为餐厅的试营业做准备，等到第二天再和她谈谈。

trans-unit.source: When you are ready, speak to Hasel to prepare for the Le Sequoia's soft opening.
trans-unit.target: 当你准备好了，和Hasel谈谈，为Le Sequoia的试营业做准备。

trans-unit.source: Open Le Sequoia when you are ready to host the soft opening, with a menu featuring at least 3 dishes and seating for 4 guests.
trans-unit.target: 当您准备好主持软开幕式时，打开Le Sequoia，菜单上至少有3道菜，可容纳4位客人。

trans-unit.source: The soft opening of Le Sequoia is complete. Speak to the guests outside.
trans-unit.target: 乐红杉的试营业已经完成。跟外面的客人说话。

trans-unit.source: The restaurant interior needs to be cleaned up before you can have a grand opening.
trans-unit.target: 餐厅内部需要清理干净，然后才能盛大开业。

trans-unit.source: Speak to Prisca at the Town Hall to have the floors fixed.
trans-unit.target: 和市政厅的普里斯卡谈谈，把地板修好。

trans-unit.source: Prisca left her tools in the abandoned bathhouse. Head to the bathhouse to find the tools.
trans-unit.target: 普里斯卡把工具忘在了废弃的澡堂里。

trans-unit.source: Go into the abandoned bathhouse and retrieve the carpenter's tools.
trans-unit.target: 走进废弃的澡堂，取回木匠的工具。

trans-unit.source: Search the abandoned bathhouse to find the carpenter's tools.
trans-unit.target: 在废弃的澡堂里找木匠的工具。

trans-unit.source: Return the carpentry tools to Prisca.
trans-unit.target: 把木工工具还给普里斯卡。

trans-unit.source: Select a new floor type for Le Sequoia from Prisca.
trans-unit.target: 从Prisca为Le Sequoia选择新的地板类型。

trans-unit.source: Prisca will have the floors fixed after one day.
trans-unit.target: 普里斯卡一天后会把地板修好。

trans-unit.source: The floors should now be fixed. Meet Prisca back at Le Sequoia.
trans-unit.target: 地板现在应该修好了。在Le Sequoia与Prisca见面。

trans-unit.source: Prepare the grand opening of Le Sequoia. Prepare a suitable menu and decor to make a good first impression.
trans-unit.target: 为Le Sequoia的盛大开业做准备。准备一份合适的菜单和装饰，给人留下良好的第一印象。

trans-unit.source: Hasel might have some ideas on preparing for the grand opening.
trans-unit.target: 哈塞尔可能对盛大开幕式的筹备工作有一些想法。

trans-unit.source: Milo is an experienced designer. He will have ideas on decorating Le Sequoia.
trans-unit.target: Milo是一位经验丰富的设计师。他会对装饰Le Sequoia有想法。

trans-unit.source: Aloys might have some rope needed for the decorations. Find him by the docks.
trans-unit.target: Aloys可能需要一些绳子来装饰。在码头找到他。

trans-unit.source: Search the nearby buckets for some rope.
trans-unit.target: 在附近的水桶里找些绳子。

trans-unit.source: Collect (10 x Clam Shells) and (30 x Watercress). Bring these items back to Milo, along with the rope.
trans-unit.target: 收集(10 x Clam Shells)和(30 x Watercress)。把这些东西连同绳子一起还给米洛。

trans-unit.source: Wait a day for Milo to complete the decorations.
Return to Milo and see if the decorations are complete.
trans-unit.target: 回到米洛，看看装饰是否完整。

trans-unit.source: Wait for Milo to complete the decorations.
When you are ready, let Hasel know that you want to begin the grand opening. You will not be able to host a regular restaurant service until the grand opening is over.
trans-unit.target: 当你准备好了，让Hasel知道你想开始盛大的开幕式。在盛大开业结束之前，您将无法举办常规餐厅服务。

trans-unit.source: Prepare Le Sequoia with a menu featuring at least 6 dishes and seating for 8 guests. Open the restaurant between 2.P.M and 6 P.M. to begin the grand opening.
trans-unit.target: 为Le Sequoia准备至少6道菜和8个座位的菜单。在下午2点到6点之间打开餐厅，开始盛大的开业。

trans-unit.source: The grand opening of Le Sequoia is complete. Speak to Hasel outside.
trans-unit.target: 红杉资本盛大开业。跟外面的哈塞尔谈谈。

trans-unit.source: April needs some help with her tea research.
trans-unit.target: April在茶叶研究方面需要一些帮助。

trans-unit.source: Speak to April near the Lonely Cliffs.
trans-unit.target: 与孤独悬崖附近的四月交谈。

trans-unit.source: Collect 30 Chili, 30 Elderberries, and 30 Sugar Cane for April.
trans-unit.target: 四月收集30个辣椒、30个接骨木和30个甘蔗。

trans-unit.source: Use the Tea Dispenser to mix a new tea for April.
trans-unit.target: 使用除茶器为四月混合一种新茶。

trans-unit.source: Help Thelio recover the missing store goods.
trans-unit.target: 帮助Thelio找回丢失的商店商品。

trans-unit.source: Search the beach caves for signs of the thieves.
trans-unit.target: 在海滩洞穴中搜寻小偷的踪迹。

trans-unit.source: The old house inside the caves looks suspicious. Maybe I should take a closer look?
trans-unit.target: 洞穴里的老房子看起来很可疑。也许我应该仔细看看？

trans-unit.source: You have found some leftover scraps from the stolen goods. Show this to Thelio.
trans-unit.target: 你发现了一些赃物的残羹剩饭。把这个给Thelio看看。

trans-unit.source: Speak to Bianca about crafting a Flour Mill.
trans-unit.target: 和比安卡谈谈制作面粉厂的事。

trans-unit.source: Bianca requires some materials for crafting a Flour Mill. Bring her 10 Iron ore, 15 Plant Roots, 5 Copper Ore, and 5 bottles of Mead. You can purchase Drills from Bianca to mine ore.
trans-unit.target: 比安卡需要一些材料来制作面粉厂。给她带10块铁矿石、15根植物根茎、5块铜矿石和5瓶米德。您可以从Bianca购买钻机来开采矿石。
询问Thelio关于获取谷物的事宜。

trans-unit.source: Delivery 30 pieces of Sorghum to Thelio. Some wild Sorghum can be found near the cliffs beside the bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: 向Thelio交付30片高粱。澡堂旁边的悬崖附近可以找到一些野生高粱。

trans-unit.source: Meet Thelio and Bianca at Bianca's shop.
trans-unit.target: 在比安卡的商店见忒里奥和比安卡。

trans-unit.source: Anna-May will help you make some decorations.
trans-unit.target: 安娜·梅会帮你做一些装饰品。

trans-unit.source: Anna-May might be able to help you with decorations. Find her at Takashi farms.
trans-unit.target: Anna May也许能帮你装饰一下。在高桥农场找到她。

trans-unit.source: Anna-May has decided to make some new lamps for Le Sequoia. Bring Anna-May 5 pieces of Uncut Quartz.
trans-unit.target: Anna May决定为Le Sequoia制作一些新灯具。为Anna May带来5块未切割的石英。

trans-unit.source: Anna-May requires some inspiration to continue her work. Provide a restaurant service for her so she can understand the essence of Le Sequoia, with a menu featuring at least 4 dishes.
trans-unit.target: Anna May需要一些灵感来继续她的工作。为她提供餐厅服务，让她了解Le Sequoia的精髓，菜单上至少有4道菜。

trans-unit.source: Speak to Anna-May outside Le Sequoia.
Anna-May has begun working on the new furniture pieces. Wait one day before visiting her.
trans-unit.target: 安娜·梅已经开始做新家具了。等一天再去看她。

trans-unit.source: Visit Anna-May inside the Takashi farmhouse.
Lucius Delacourt will eat at Le Sequoia and deliver a critic review.
trans-unit.target: Lucius Delacourt将在Le Sequoia餐厅用餐，并发表评论。

trans-unit.source: Prepare Le Sequoia with a menu featuring at least 7 dishes and seating for 8 guests. Open Le Sequoia between 10 A.M. and 6 P.M. when you are ready for Lucius Delacourt's arrival.
trans-unit.target: 为Le Sequoia准备至少7道菜和8个座位的菜单。上午10点至下午6点，当您准备迎接Lucius Delacourt的到来时，打开Le Sequoia。

trans-unit.source: Wait one day for Lucius' review of Le Sequoia.
trans-unit.target: 等待卢修斯对《红杉》的评论。

trans-unit.source: Read Lucius' review of Le Sequoia.
Lucius has not left White Ash Harbor and instead has a mysterious request.
trans-unit.target: 卢修斯没有离开白灰港，而是有一个神秘的请求。

trans-unit.source: Meet Lucius in room 201 of Hotel Rose.
trans-unit.target: 在玫瑰酒店201号房间见卢修斯。

trans-unit.source: Something is stirring in the abandoned Peony Bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: 废弃的牡丹浴室里有什么动静。

trans-unit.source: Chef Casteau is back, and asks you for a favor. Meet him at the Peony Bathhouse between 8 PM and midnight.
trans-unit.target: Casteau厨师回来了，请你帮个忙。晚上8点到午夜在牡丹馆见他。

trans-unit.source: Speak to Bianca about make some copper pipes to help repair the bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: 和比安卡谈谈做些铜管来帮助修理澡堂的事。

trans-unit.source: Bring Bianca 5 Copper Ores and 5 Iron Ores for the pipes, and 5 bottles of Vodka as payment.
trans-unit.target: 给比安卡带来5个铜矿和5个铁矿作为烟斗，还有5瓶伏特加作为付款。

trans-unit.source: Wait one day for Bianca to finish crafting the copper pipes.
trans-unit.target: 等比安卡完成铜管的制作。

trans-unit.source: Visit Bianca at her shop to pick up the copper pipes.
trans-unit.target: 去比安卡的商店买铜管。

trans-unit.source: Bring the completed copper pipes back to Nadjet at the abandoned bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: 将完工的铜管带回废弃澡堂的Nadjet。

trans-unit.source: Learn the Peony Bathhouse's secret method of creating a great bathing experience.
trans-unit.target: 学习牡丹浴室创造绝佳沐浴体验的秘密方法。

trans-unit.source: Purchase some Instant Ice Packs from Valentina at the infirmary.
trans-unit.target: 在医务室从瓦伦蒂娜那里购买一些速溶冰袋。

trans-unit.source: Head into the volcano and mine 15 pieces of Sulfur to bring back to Nadjet.
Successfully mix a Bath Blok in the bathhouse mechanical room.
trans-unit.target: 在澡堂机械室成功混合了一块沐浴露。

trans-unit.source: Gain Aylin's trust and host a soft opening at the Teahouse.
trans-unit.target: 赢得Aylin的信任，在茶馆举办一个软开幕式。

trans-unit.source: In order to gain Aylin's trust, you must complete a restaurant service at Le Sequoia and end the service with a total Reputation of 300.
trans-unit.target: 为了获得Aylin的信任，您必须在Le Sequoia完成餐厅服务，并以300的总信誉结束服务。

trans-unit.source: You have gained the required reputation at Le Sequoia. Speak to Aylin at the Bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: 您在红杉资本获得了所需的声誉。和澡堂的艾林谈谈。

trans-unit.source: Aylin has given you the keys to the Teahouse. Visit your new restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 艾林已经把茶馆的钥匙给你了。参观你的新餐厅。

trans-unit.source: Host a soft opening at the Teahouse between 10 A.M. and 6 P.M., with a menu featuring at least 6 dishes and seating for 10 guests.
trans-unit.target: 上午10点至下午6点，在茶馆举办一场软开幕式，菜单上至少有6道菜，可容纳10位客人。

trans-unit.source: You have completed the Teahouse soft opening. Speak to the Bathhouse staff in the lobby.
trans-unit.target: 您已经完成了茶馆的试营业。与大厅的澡堂工作人员交谈。

trans-unit.source: Nadjet is facing a sudden problem that could jeopardize the bathhouse's grand opening.
trans-unit.target: Nadjet面临着一个突然的问题，可能会危及澡堂的盛大开业。

trans-unit.source: Prepare Le Sequoia and host Nadjet's dinner between 5 P.M. and 9 P.M., with a menu featuring at least 6 dishes and seating for 4 guests.
trans-unit.target: 准备Le Sequoia并在下午5点至9点之间举办Nadjet的晚餐，菜单上至少有6道菜，可容纳4位客人。

trans-unit.source: Nadjet's dinner for Damien has concluded. Speak to them outside.
trans-unit.target: Nadjet为达米恩准备的晚餐已经结束。在外面跟他们说话。

trans-unit.source: Make the final preparations for the grand opening of the Peony Bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: 为牡丹馆的盛大开业做最后的准备。

trans-unit.source: Fill up all 3 Bathhouse baths with Bath Bloks.
trans-unit.target: 用沐浴露填满所有3个澡堂。

trans-unit.source: Let Aylin know when you are ready to begin the grand opening.
trans-unit.target: 让Aylin知道你什么时候准备好开始盛大的开幕式。

trans-unit.source: Open the Teahouse between 10 A.M. and 6 P.M. to begin the grand opening, with a menu featuring at least 10 dishes and seating for 20 guests.
trans-unit.target: 在上午10点至下午6点之间打开茶馆，开始盛大的开幕式，菜单上至少有10道菜，可容纳20位客人。

trans-unit.source: The grand opening is over. Speak to Aylin in her office.
trans-unit.target: 盛大的开幕式结束了。在Aylin的办公室与她交谈。

trans-unit.source: Help Pomarine defeat the Ancient Razorback.
Prepare your supplies for the final hunt and wait for one day. Return to Pomarine when you are ready.
trans-unit.target: 准备好最后一次狩猎的补给，等待一天。准备好后返回Pomarine。

trans-unit.source: When you have prepared your hunting supplies, let Pomarine know that you are ready.
trans-unit.target: 当你准备好狩猎用品后，让Pomarine知道你已经准备好了。

trans-unit.source: Create a new Gazing Ball for April after a boar destroyed her home.
trans-unit.target: 在一头野猪摧毁了她的家后，为四月创建了一个新的凝视球。

trans-unit.source: You should ask Bianca about the method for extracting perfect quartz.
trans-unit.target: 你应该向比安卡询问提取完美石英的方法。

trans-unit.source: Now that you have a method of extracting perfect quartz crystals, look for a large quartz growth in the White Ash Harbor caves.
trans-unit.target: 现在你有了提取完美石英晶体的方法，在白灰港洞穴中寻找大型石英生长。

trans-unit.source: Now that you extracted a perfect quartz, Speak to April again regarding creating a new crystal ball.
trans-unit.target: 既然你提取了一块完美的石英，请再次与April谈谈如何创造一个新的水晶球。

trans-unit.source: Anna-May is a local sculpture. She may be able to help shape the quartz crystal.
trans-unit.target: Anna May是当地的一座雕塑。她也许能帮助塑造石英晶体。

trans-unit.source: Anna-May isn't feeling very well. She requires some headache medicine before she can continue to work.
trans-unit.target: 安娜梅感觉不太舒服。她需要一些头痛药才能继续工作。

trans-unit.source: Meet Anna-May at Takashi Farmhouse to retrieve the polished crystal.
trans-unit.target: 在Takashi农舍与Anna May见面，取回抛光水晶。

trans-unit.source: Cook offerings of 3 Vegetable Dishes as a gesture of goodwill to the spirits of the forest, so that they will bless the crystal ball. (0/3 Cooked)
trans-unit.target: 烹饪3道素食菜肴，以示对森林精灵的善意，让他们祝福水晶球。(0/3 Cooked)

trans-unit.source: Cook offerings of 3 Vegetable Dishes as a gesture of goodwill to the spirits of the forest, so that they will bless the crystal ball. (1/3 Cooked)
trans-unit.target: 烹饪3道素食菜肴，以示对森林精灵的善意，让他们祝福水晶球。(1/3 Cooked)

trans-unit.source: Cook offerings of 3 Vegetable Dishes as a gesture of goodwill to the spirits of the forest, so that they will bless the crystal ball. (2/3 Cooked)
trans-unit.target: 烹饪3道素食菜肴，以示对森林精灵的善意，让他们祝福水晶球。(2/3 Cooked)

trans-unit.source: Now that you have prepared 3 dishes to offer to the forest spirits, you must bring the crystal ball and offerings to the altar in the deep forest.
trans-unit.target: 现在你已经准备了3道菜来供奉森林精灵，你必须把水晶球和祭品带到深林中的祭坛上。

trans-unit.source: The crystal ball and food offerings have been placed on the altar. Leave the crystal ball on the altar overnight to attract the spirits.
trans-unit.target: 水晶球和供品已经放在祭坛上。把水晶球放在祭坛上过夜，以吸引灵魂。

trans-unit.source: You have left the crystal ball in the woods overnight. You should check to see if the offering worked.
trans-unit.target: 你把水晶球忘在树林里过夜了。你应该检查一下报价是否有效。

trans-unit.source: The gazing ball emanates a new and strange energy. Bring the gazing ball back to April.
trans-unit.target: 凝视球散发出一种新的奇怪的能量。把凝视球带回四月。
可以使用强大的后期游戏增强。

trans-unit.source: Do not receive buffs from most consumable items.
trans-unit.target: 不要从大多数消耗品中获得增益。

trans-unit.source: Chance of higher-rarity chefs for hire.
trans-unit.target: 雇佣更稀有厨师的机会。
购买商品时价格更优惠。
销售商品时价格更优惠。

trans-unit.source: Chance of higher-rarity waiters for hire.
trans-unit.target: 更稀有的服务员被雇佣的机会。

trans-unit.source: Uriel can often be found at his butcher shop Chop, in the town center.
trans-unit.target: 人们经常会在镇中心的 Chop 肉店里看到 Uriel。

trans-unit.source: Aloys is a fisherman and can often be found around the White Ash Harbor docks.
trans-unit.target: Aloys是一名渔民，经常在白灰港码头附近找到他。

trans-unit.source: Hasel can often be found at her shop Bubble Shack, on the western side of town.
trans-unit.target: Hasel经常可以在她位于城镇西侧的Bubble Shack商店找到。

trans-unit.source: Aime can often be found training in White Ash Harbor's rec center by the docks.
trans-unit.target: Aime经常在码头旁的白灰港娱乐中心接受训练。

trans-unit.source: Bianca can often be found in her electronics shop Bits & Pieces, by the waterfront promenade.
trans-unit.target: 比安卡经常可以在海滨长廊旁的电子商店Bits&Pieces找到她。

trans-unit.source: Pomarine's house is found along the western coast, where she regularly goes hunting.
trans-unit.target: Pomarine的房子位于西海岸，她经常去那里打猎。

trans-unit.source: April runs a gift shop from her home, west of Le Sequoia.
trans-unit.target: April在Le Sequoia以西的家中经营着一家礼品店。

trans-unit.source: Nacim works at Circuit Lodge and can often be found at the hotel reception.
trans-unit.target: Nacim在Circuit Lodge工作，经常可以在酒店前台找到。

trans-unit.source: Anna-May can often be found around Takashi farms.
trans-unit.target: Anna May经常出现在Takashi农场附近。

trans-unit.source: Mae-Lou can often be found at her vegi shop in the town center, or working the fields in her farm.
trans-unit.target: Mae Lou经常出现在市中心的蔬菜店，或者在农场的田里干活。

trans-unit.source: Prisca is the assistant to the mayor, and works at the Town Hall.
trans-unit.target: 普里斯卡是市长的助理，在市政厅工作。

trans-unit.source: Bowie can often be found at his seafood stall at the docks, or wandering the western cliffs.
trans-unit.target: 鲍伊经常出现在码头的海鲜摊上，或者在西部悬崖上闲逛。

trans-unit.source: Milo can often be found at his clothing shop in White Ash Harbor's waterfront promenade.
trans-unit.target: 米洛经常出现在白灰港海滨长廊的服装店。

trans-unit.source: Valentina can often be found working in White Ash Harbor's infirmary.
trans-unit.target: 瓦伦蒂娜经常在白灰港的医务室工作。

trans-unit.source: Bea can often be found at her bar at night, in the town center.
trans-unit.target: Bea经常在市中心的酒吧里过夜。

trans-unit.source: Aylin runs the Bathhouse and can often be found in her office.
trans-unit.target: Aylin经营着澡堂，经常可以在她的办公室里找到。

trans-unit.source: Nadjet can often be found working at the Bathhouse.
Thelio can often be found working at Milk & Wheat in the town center.
Lucius is currently staying at a room in Hotel Rose. He usually takes strolls around the promenade area.
trans-unit.target: Lucius目前住在玫瑰酒店的一个房间里。他通常在散步区散步。

trans-unit.source: Nabiha can often be found at her fresh fruit shop in the town center.
trans-unit.target: Nabiha经常可以在市中心的新鲜水果店找到。

trans-unit.source: T.E.C. can be found to his Takoyaki diner at the docks.
Elton can be found working at the convenience store 8-11.
Robert is the head bellhop in Hotel Rose, and can be found in the lobby.
trans-unit.target: 罗伯特是玫瑰酒店的首席行李员，在大堂可以找到他。

trans-unit.source: Yvonne is a bellhop can often be found working in Hotel Rose.
trans-unit.target: Yvonne是一名行李员，经常在玫瑰酒店工作。

trans-unit.source: Cora can often be found working at White Ash Harbor docks.
trans-unit.target: 科拉经常在白灰港码头工作。

trans-unit.source: Leon is the ship captain and can often be found at White Ash Harbor docks.
trans-unit.target: 莱昂是船长，经常可以在白灰港码头找到他。

trans-unit.source: Mary Anne can often be found wandering around Takashi farms.
trans-unit.target: 玛丽·安妮经常在高桥农场闲逛。

trans-unit.source: Casper can often be found wandering around Takashi farms.
trans-unit.target: 卡斯珀经常在高桥农场附近游荡。

trans-unit.source: Gavin is the Mayor of White Ash Harbor and can be found at the Town Hall.
trans-unit.target: 加文是白灰港的市长，可以在市政厅找到他。

trans-unit.source: Mei can often be found working at the Bathhouse.
Farhan can often be found working at the Bathhouse.
Duncan can often be found working at the Bathhouse.
Dimitri is a Lelsh empolyee who works at the train station ticket office.
trans-unit.target: 迪米特里是一名在火车站售票处工作的Lelsh员工。

trans-unit.source: Alisa is a Lelsh empolyee who works at the train station ticket office.
trans-unit.target: Alisa是一名在火车站售票处工作的Lelsh员工。

trans-unit.source: Benjamin can often be found working at Parcel Co. by the train station.
trans-unit.target: 本杰明经常在火车站旁边的包裹公司工作。

trans-unit.source: Ema is a barista who works on the high-speed train.
trans-unit.target: Ema是一名在高速列车上工作的咖啡师。

trans-unit.source: Sahil is a Lelsh employee who works at the Lelsh office in White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: Sahil是Lelsh的一名员工，在White Ash Harbor的Lelsh办公室工作。

trans-unit.source: Duri is a Lelsh employee who works at the Lelsh office in White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: Duri是Lelsh的一名员工，在White Ash Harbor的Lelsh办公室工作。

trans-unit.source: Henri can often be found in his furniture shop La Galerie, in White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: 亨利经常可以在白灰港的家具店La Galerie找到。

trans-unit.source: Asher can be found working as the conductor in the high-speed train.
trans-unit.target: Asher在高速列车上担任列车长。

trans-unit.source: Eliza can often be found working at the Library, in White Ash Harbor.
trans-unit.target: 伊丽莎经常在白灰港的图书馆工作。

trans-unit.source: Alice works as Lucius' assistant and can usually be found at his office.
trans-unit.target: 爱丽丝是卢修斯的助手，通常可以在他的办公室找到。

trans-unit.source: Uriel is a friendly butcher who always seems to be working. He wishes for the success of Le Sequoia, and hopes he can provide quality meats for your dishes.
trans-unit.target: 乌里尔是个友善的屠夫，似乎总是在工作。他祝愿Le Sequoia取得成功，并希望他能为您的菜肴提供优质的肉类。

trans-unit.source: Aloys is a fisherman of few words. Despite his cool and mysterious demeanor, he has always been helpful, and talks to strangers like friends.
trans-unit.target: 阿洛伊斯是个沉默寡言的渔夫。尽管他举止冷静神秘，但他总是乐于助人，像朋友一样与陌生人交谈。

trans-unit.source: An older generation android, Hasel was abandoned in a dumpster within Billboard City, before being recovered by Aloys. A small frog was found with her, and has never left her side since.
trans-unit.target: Hasel是一个老一代的机器人，被遗弃在Billboard City的垃圾桶里，然后被Aloys找到。一只小青蛙和她在一起，从那以后就再也没有离开过她。

trans-unit.source: A competitive body builder who loves to show off his gains. Just like his wife Bea, he loves to live life to the fullest and won't ever decline an invitation to a party.
trans-unit.target: 一个有竞争力的健美运动员，喜欢炫耀自己的成就。就像他的妻子Bea一样，他喜欢充实地生活，永远不会拒绝参加聚会的邀请。

trans-unit.source: A gifted programmer and mechanic, Bianca is a cold woman with questionable morality. She can be extremely helpful through her skills, for the right price of course.
trans-unit.target: 比安卡是一名天才程序员和机械师，她是一个道德有问题的冷酷女人。当然，只要价格合适，她凭借自己的技能可以提供极大的帮助。

trans-unit.source: As one of the oldest residents of White Ash Harbor, Pomarine's looks can be deceiving. She is a fierce hunter who loves to experience life in the wilderness, and a mentor for all aspiring rangers.
trans-unit.target: 作为白灰港最古老的居民之一，Pomarine的外表可能具有欺骗性。她是一名凶猛的猎人，喜欢在荒野中体验生活，也是所有有抱负的护林员的导师。

trans-unit.source: April is a strange woman who seemingly possesses clairvoyant powers. She was recently travelling through exotic lands to grow her research towards herbs and teas.
trans-unit.target: April是一个奇怪的女人，她似乎拥有洞察力。她最近在异国他乡旅行，以发展她对草药和茶的研究。

trans-unit.source: Nacim manages the Circuit Lodge in White Ash Harbor and dedicates his time towards his daughters. He always puts on a friendly face and hopes for Le Sequoia to succeed.
trans-unit.target: Nacim管理着白灰港的Circuit Lodge，并将时间奉献给他的女儿们。他总是摆出一副友好的面孔，希望勒红杉能够成功。

trans-unit.source: Anna-May is a shy girl who rarely comes out of her home in Takashi Farms. Polar opposites from her sister Mae-Lou, she prefers to spend her time on her scultures and playing video games.
trans-unit.target: Anna May是一个害羞的女孩，很少走出她在Takashi Farms的家。与姐姐梅楼截然相反，她更喜欢把时间花在雕塑和玩电子游戏上。

trans-unit.source: Mae-Lou is a friendly farmer who lives in Takashi Farms with her parents and her twin sister Anna-May. She seems content with her rustic life, and takes pleasure in being in the fields.
trans-unit.target: Mae Lou是一位友善的农民，与父母和双胞胎妹妹Anna May住在Takashi Farms。她似乎对乡村生活感到满意，并喜欢在田里干活。

trans-unit.source: Prisca is a tenacious woman who is always working hard to improve the state White Ash Harbor. She forgoes personal pleasure and pursues her work, often to an unhealthy degree.
trans-unit.target: 普里斯卡是一个顽强的女人，她一直在努力改善白灰港州。她放弃了个人乐趣，追求自己的工作，往往达到了不健康的程度。

trans-unit.source: On the surface, Bowie seems like a relaxed old man who wants to do as little as possible each day. He spends his days running his seafood store, and taking strolls along the seaside cliffs.
trans-unit.target: 从表面上看，鲍伊似乎是一个放松的老人，每天想做的事情尽可能少。他白天经营海鲜店，沿着海边悬崖散步。

trans-unit.source: Angi is a young android man living a spoiled life with his wealthy adopted human mother. He is unsure of his purpose in life, greater amplified by being him being a non-human.
trans-unit.target: Angi是一个年轻的机器人男人，和他富有的养母过着被宠坏的生活。他不确定自己的人生目标，更重要的是，他是一个非人类。

trans-unit.source: Fleur runs a famous cafe in Billboard City, passed down to her by her family. She is still coming to terms with her new responsibilities, and still wishes to live a spontaneous lifestyle.
trans-unit.target: Fleur在Billboard City经营着一家著名的咖啡馆，这是她的家人传给她的。她仍在接受新的责任，仍希望过一种自发的生活方式。

trans-unit.source: Milo sells clothing by the lower promenade in White Ash Harbor. He has a quirky personality and can be impolite at times. He seems like he has a crush on Hasel.
trans-unit.target: 米洛在白灰港的下长廊卖衣服。他性格古怪，有时会不礼貌。他似乎对哈塞尔有好感。

trans-unit.source: Valentina manages the infirmary in White Ash Harbor, despite not having a medical degree. Still, the locals go to her for medical aid. She has a reserved personality, and mostly keeps to herself.
trans-unit.target: 瓦伦蒂娜管理着白灰港的医务室，尽管她没有医学学位。尽管如此，当地人还是去找她寻求医疗援助。她性格内敛，大多独处。

trans-unit.source: When not managing her 6 kids, Bea manages the local bar in White Ash Harbor's town square, creating delicious cocktails that the tourists can't get enough of.
trans-unit.target: 在不管理她的6个孩子的时候，Bea管理着白灰港镇广场的当地酒吧，制作了游客们无法满足的美味鸡尾酒。

trans-unit.source: Aylin is an android woman who is always dressed in her signature blue Kimono. She is mysterious and quiet, but has an air of confidence and power surrounding her. She owns the bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: Aylin是一个机器人女人，她总是穿着她标志性的蓝色和服。她神秘而安静，但周围有一种自信和力量的气息。她拥有澡堂。

trans-unit.source: Nadjet is Aylin's passionate and diligent helper. She runs the day-to-day in the Peony Bathhouse, and does everything she can to make sure Aylin is happy.
trans-unit.target: Nadjet是Aylin热情而勤奋的助手。她负责牡丹浴室的日常事务，并尽一切努力确保艾林快乐。

trans-unit.source: Thelio helps run the Milk & Wheat shop for his boss. Despite being rather cold to strangers, he warms up to people after sharing experiences and accomplishing tasks together.
trans-unit.target: Thelio帮老板经营牛奶小麦店。尽管他对陌生人很冷淡，但在分享经验和共同完成任务后，他对人很热情。

trans-unit.source: Lucius is a famous food critic from Billboard City. His reviews have closed down restaurants of top chefs. He desires your support after seeing your talent, but has not revealed his true goals.
trans-unit.target: Lucius是Billboard City的著名美食评论家。他的评论关闭了顶级厨师的餐厅。看到你的才华后，他希望得到你的支持，但还没有透露他的真正目标。

trans-unit.source: Nabiha is a lively, upbeat woman who sells fruits. She is a free spirit, and has travelled and experienced the world. She now practices veganism, and hopes you do the same for the restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 纳比哈是一个活泼乐观的卖水果的女人。她是一个自由的人，周游世界，体验世界。她现在实行素食主义，并希望你也为这家餐厅做同样的事情。

trans-unit.source: Damien is one of the heads of the Columbo crime family, based in Billboard City. In the past, he was the original guardian of Nadjet and sent her to steal the deed to the Peony Bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: 达米恩是位于Billboard City的Columbo犯罪家族的负责人之一。过去，他是娜杰特的原始监护人，派她去牡丹澡堂偷契约。

trans-unit.source: Hugo is an officer of the LELSH Corporation. He has been tasked with a mysterious mission involving the volcano of White Ash Harbor. You can often find him poking around the volcano base and collecting samples.
trans-unit.target: Hugo是LELSH公司的高级职员。他被赋予了一项神秘的任务，涉及白灰港火山。你经常可以看到他在火山底部四处闲逛并收集样本。

trans-unit.source: Koa is an old friend and chef who studied under Vincent Casteau. He dreams of one day running his own successful restaurant. His competitiveness has always pushed you forward.
trans-unit.target: Koa是一位老朋友和厨师，曾师从Vincent Casteau。他梦想有一天能经营一家成功的餐厅。他的竞争力总是推动你前进。

trans-unit.source: Camille is an old friend and chef who studied under Vincent Casteau. She dreams of one day running her own successful restaurant. Her competitiveness has always pushed you forward.
trans-unit.target: 卡米尔是一位老朋友和厨师，曾师从文森特·卡斯托。她梦想有一天能经营一家成功的餐厅。她的竞争力总是推动你前进。

trans-unit.source: Vincent Casteau is a renowned chef and a mentor that taught you cooking. After leaving his first restaurant Le Sequoia, he went on to run several successful restaurants around the country.
trans-unit.target: Vincent Casteau是一位著名的厨师，也是教你烹饪的导师。离开他的第一家餐厅Le Sequoia后，他继续在全国各地经营几家成功的餐厅。

trans-unit.source: Otto Canton was your former boss, who has a propensity towards outbursts of anger, especially towards his staff. Despite his obnoxious personality, he is an extremely skilled chef.
trans-unit.target: 奥托·坎顿是你的前老板，他有爆发愤怒的倾向，尤其是对他的员工。尽管他性格令人讨厌，但他是一位技艺精湛的厨师。

trans-unit.source: Uriel is a passionate butcher who is often overworked. Despite his friendly and boisterous demeanor, he prefers quiet activities with close friends, and enjoying a cup of hot tea.
trans-unit.target: 乌列尔是个热情的屠夫，经常超负荷工作。尽管他的举止友好而喧闹，但他更喜欢和亲密的朋友一起安静地活动，喝一杯热茶。

trans-unit.source: Aloys is a fisherman who dreams of a different life. In fact, he has always loved machines and is saving money to go to engineering school. He also enjoys collecting vintage clothes.
trans-unit.target: Aloys是一个梦想着不同生活的渔夫。事实上，他一直都很喜欢机器，并且正在存钱上工程学校。他还喜欢收集复古服装。

trans-unit.source: Hasel is an android girl who is always accompanied by her frog Boba. Despite being an older android model who suffers from frequent bugs, she always possesses a positive outlook.
trans-unit.target: Hasel是一个机器人女孩，总是有她的青蛙Boba陪伴。尽管她是一个经常出现bug的年长安卓模特，但她总是有积极的态度。

trans-unit.source: Aime is a boisterous man who is a loving father to his 6 kids, and loving husband to his wife Bea. He works as a fitness trainer in the local recreation center, helping others grow their muscles.
trans-unit.target: Aime是一个喧闹的男人，他是6个孩子的慈爱父亲，也是妻子Bea的慈爱丈夫。他在当地娱乐中心担任健身教练，帮助其他人锻炼肌肉。

trans-unit.source: Bianca is an engineering genius who has grown to love the quiet life of White Ash Harbor. Despite her cold demeanor, she deeply cares for the locals and is a loyal friend to those she trusts.
trans-unit.target: 比安卡是一位工程天才，他已经爱上了白灰港的宁静生活。尽管举止冷酷，但她非常关心当地人，是她信任的人的忠实朋友。

trans-unit.source: The legendary hunter of White Ash Harbor, Pomarine has slowed down her adventuring lifestyle due to her older age. Despite a weaker body, she still possess a fiery temperament.
trans-unit.target: Pomarine是白灰港的传奇猎人，由于年龄较大，她放慢了冒险的生活方式。尽管身体较弱，但她仍然具有火爆的气质。

trans-unit.source: Despite engaging with the spiritual arts, April possesses deep practical knowledge of various herbs and teas. She is friendly and helpful through her own peculiar ways.
trans-unit.target: 尽管从事精神艺术，April对各种草药和茶有着深厚的实践知识。她以自己独特的方式友好和乐于助人。

trans-unit.source: A widow and a father of two girls, Nacim dedicates his time to creating crafts and exploring the beautiful outdoors with his kids. He is also an avid gamer in his free time.
trans-unit.target: 作为一名寡妇和两个女孩的父亲，Nacim致力于创作工艺品，并与孩子们一起探索美丽的户外。他在空闲时间也是一名狂热的游戏玩家。

trans-unit.source: Anna-May is a talented sculptor that prefers to spend her time indoors. Despite being polar-opposites with her twin sister, they have always loved and supported each other.
trans-unit.target: 安娜·梅是一位才华横溢的雕塑家，她更喜欢在室内度过时光。尽管和她的双胞胎妹妹截然相反，但他们一直互相爱和支持。

trans-unit.source: Mae-Lou is a hardworking farmer who spends her time working the fields and running her veggie shop. She also takes care of her aging parents, and helping out her twin sister when she can.
trans-unit.target: Mae Lou是一位勤劳的农民，她把时间花在田里干活和经营蔬菜店上。她还照顾年迈的父母，并在可能的时候帮助她的双胞胎妹妹。

trans-unit.source: Prisca is the aide to White Ash Harbor's mayor. She cares deeply for the wellbeing of the town, and is often frantically running around town completing her tasks.
trans-unit.target: 普里斯卡是白灰港市长的助手。她非常关心小镇的福祉，经常在镇上疯狂地跑来跑去完成任务。

trans-unit.source: Bowie is Uriel's grandfather and the local fishmonger. He has adventured across the whole world, and has decided to settle for a quiet life in White Ash Harbor in his old age.
trans-unit.target: 鲍伊是乌列尔的祖父，也是当地的鱼贩。他冒险穿越了整个世界，并决定在晚年在白灰港过上平静的生活。

trans-unit.source: Angi is a spoiled android boy who is seeking his own path in life. His life in Billboard City has been comfy and cushy, so emerging out of his bubble has been a difficult journey.
trans-unit.target: Angi是一个被宠坏的机器人男孩，他正在寻找自己的人生道路。他在Billboard City的生活一直很舒适，所以走出他的泡沫是一段艰难的旅程。

trans-unit.source: A spontaneous girl living in Billboard City, Fleur has a complicated relationship with her demanding family. Fleur has been given the task of running her successful family owned caf�.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个生活在Billboard City的自发女孩，Fleur与要求苛刻的家庭有着复杂的关系。Fleur被赋予了经营她成功的家族咖啡馆的任务。

trans-unit.source: A quirky man who sells clothes in White Ash Harbor. He is deeply passionate about his clothing designs, and also makes Oni Masks as a hobby.
trans-unit.target: 一个在白灰港卖衣服的古怪男人。他对自己的服装设计充满热情，也把Oni口罩作为爱好。

trans-unit.source: Although not a licensed doctor, Valentina has the difficult task of managing the local clinic. To alleviate stress from her high-demand job, she indulges in horror films and watches combat sports.
trans-unit.target: 虽然瓦伦蒂娜不是持证医生，但她面临着管理当地诊所的艰巨任务。为了缓解高要求工作的压力，她沉迷于恐怖电影和观看格斗运动。

trans-unit.source: Bea is a vibrant woman who is a loving mother to her 6 kids, and a loving wife to her husband Aime. She runs her bar every night, and loves going to the beach or taking a hot bath.
trans-unit.target: Bea是一个充满活力的女人，她是6个孩子的慈爱母亲，也是丈夫Aime的慈爱妻子。她每晚经营酒吧，喜欢去海滩或洗热水澡。

trans-unit.source: An android woman with a complex past. Aylin was once human and is one of the few humans to undergo android transformation to save her life. She now manages the Peony Bathhouse.
trans-unit.target: 一个有着复杂过去的机器人女人。Aylin曾经是人类，是为数不多的通过机器人改造来拯救自己生命的人类之一。她现在经营牡丹浴室。

trans-unit.source: Nadjet dedicates her life in support of Aylin and the bathhouse. She was once a member of a criminal organisation, before escaping and coming to White Ash Harbor to begin a new life.
trans-unit.target: Nadjet毕生致力于支持Aylin和澡堂。她曾经是一个犯罪组织的成员，之后逃离并来到白灰港开始新的生活。

trans-unit.source: Thelio is a young man struggling with his sense of purpose. He currently helps manage the Milk & Wheat shop but hopes to do something significant one day. He enjoys reading.
trans-unit.target: Thelio是一个与目标感作斗争的年轻人。他目前帮助管理牛奶和小麦店，但希望有一天能做一些有意义的事情。他喜欢读书。

trans-unit.source: A well-known food critic in the culinary world, Lucius puts on a kind facade but hides a rotten personality underneath. Despite his personality, he cares deeply for the culinary arts.
trans-unit.target: 卢修斯是烹饪界著名的美食评论家，他外表善良，但内心却隐藏着一种腐朽的个性。尽管他有个性，但他非常关心烹饪艺术。

trans-unit.source: Once a reality show contestant in her youth, Nabiha experienced a lavish lifestyle full of parties and designer clothes. She decided to move to White Ash Harbor to become closer with nature
trans-unit.target: Nabiha年轻时曾是一名真人秀选手，她经历了充满派对和设计师服装的奢华生活方式。她决定搬到白灰港，与大自然亲密接触

trans-unit.source: Koa is a talented chef who like yourself, grew up under the tutelage chef Vincent Casteau. He runs his own restaurant in Billboard City, and hopes to push the limits of delicious food.
trans-unit.target: Koa是一位才华横溢的厨师，他和你一样，在厨师Vincent Casteau的指导下长大。他在Billboard City经营着自己的餐厅，并希望突破美味食物的极限。

trans-unit.source: Camille is a talented chef who like yourself, grew up under the tutelage chef Vincent Casteau. She runs her own restaurant in Billboard City, and hopes to push the limits of delicious food.
trans-unit.target: 卡米尔是一位才华横溢的厨师，他和你一样，在厨师文森特·卡斯托的指导下长大。她在Billboard City经营着自己的餐厅，并希望突破美味食物的极限。

trans-unit.source: Vincent Casteau is world-renowned chef and the former owner of Le Sequoia. He has taught many young chefs throughout his career, and is known for helping communities through food.
trans-unit.target: Vincent Casteau是世界著名的厨师，也是Le Sequoia的前老板。在他的职业生涯中，他教过许多年轻的厨师，并以通过食物帮助社区而闻名。

trans-unit.source: Otto Canton is a harsh chef who runs one of the top restaurants in Billboard City. At one point your former boss, he continues to terrorize young chefs in his pursuit of culinary perfection.
trans-unit.target: Otto Canton是一位严厉的厨师，他经营着Billboard City的顶级餐厅之一。有一次，你的前老板在追求烹饪完美的过程中，继续恐吓年轻厨师。
对于快速旅行来说太晚了
晒晒我们学校的健身馆
加载上一个故事任务完成

trans-unit.source: Overwrite your autosave file with previous sleep save file from (time)?
trans-unit.target: 是否用之前(time)的睡眠存档覆盖自动存档？

trans-unit.source: Overwrite your autosave file with previous story quest (quest) complete save file?
trans-unit.target: 是否用上一个请求(quest)完成的存档覆盖自动存档？

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this character?
trans-unit.target: 您确定要删除此角色吗？

trans-unit.source: This game has autosave. Separate save files are made when your player goes to sleep, and after completing a main story quest.
trans-unit.target: 这个游戏有自动保存功能。当你的玩家入睡时，以及在完成一个主要故事任务后，会制作单独的保存文件。

trans-unit.source: Loading one of these save files will overwrite the autosave save file.
trans-unit.target: 加载其中一个保存文件将覆盖自动保存的保存文件。

trans-unit.source: OMG I was here in the library on a Tuesday night and I saw Eliza the librarian with a strange man. It was dark, but I think they were kissing!! Ewwww.
trans-unit.target: 天哪，星期二晚上我在图书馆，看到图书管理员伊丽莎和一个陌生男人在一起。天很黑，但我觉得他们在接吻！！哇。

trans-unit.source: I think that man was wearing a green sweater, and had a weird round hat. I feel like I've seen him somewhere before . . .
trans-unit.target: 我想那个人穿着一件绿色毛衣，戴着一顶奇怪的圆帽。我觉得我以前在什么地方见过他。

trans-unit.source: Prisca was being a BIG MEANIE today. I asked her if she wanted to kick a football with me, and she told me to help her collect trash!
trans-unit.target: 普里斯卡今天是个大人物。我问她是否想和我踢足球，她让我帮她捡垃圾！

trans-unit.source: I don't even like garbage! Now I have to sit in this lame library all day until my dad picks me up.
trans-unit.target: 我甚至不喜欢垃圾！现在我不得不整天坐在这个破旧的图书馆里，直到我爸爸来接我。

trans-unit.source: I want to throw a big party and invite all my friends from school! I want to buy lots of alcohol since I heard from Fred that it makes parties more fun.
trans-unit.target: 我想举办一个盛大的聚会，邀请学校里的所有朋友！我想买很多酒，因为我从弗雷德那里听说这会让聚会更有趣。

trans-unit.source: My mom says I can't drink alcohol until I am 18. I guess the party will have to wait until my 18th birthday. Only 10 more years to go!
trans-unit.target: 我妈妈说我18岁之前不能喝酒。我想聚会要等到我18岁生日。只剩下10年了！

trans-unit.source: Guess what! I heard that I am getting an FunStation 420 for my birthday. I already know what games I will be getting. This is going to be the best birthday ever!
trans-unit.target: 你猜怎么着！我听说我生日要买一台FunStation 420。我已经知道我会玩什么游戏了。这将是有史以来最好的生日！

trans-unit.source: You gotta come over so we can play together. It's no fun to play with my brothers. They never take games seriously.
trans-unit.target: 你得过来，这样我们才能一起玩。和我的兄弟们玩不好玩。他们从不认真对待游戏。

trans-unit.source: Ok. I have hidden the package under the librarian's desk. She doesn�t have a clue, ha! Be sure that nobody is looking when you go pick it up.
trans-unit.target: 好的。我已经把包裹藏在图书管理员的桌子下面了。她一点都不知道，哈哈！当你去捡的时候，确保没有人在看。

trans-unit.source: My dad would kill me if he found out I had these. And make sure you keep it away from your parents too! If we get caught, you will be sorry!
trans-unit.target: 如果我爸爸发现我有这些，他会杀了我的。请确保你也远离你的父母！如果我们被抓了，你会后悔的！

trans-unit.source: I was in math class this morning and Tom kept staring at me. I think he likes me. It's kinda gross. You know that I like Kevin. He is so cool, especially when he is on his skateboard.
trans-unit.target: 今天早上我在上数学课，汤姆一直盯着我看。我觉得他喜欢我。这有点恶心。你知道我喜欢凯文。他很酷，尤其是当他在滑板上的时候。

trans-unit.source: But Kevin always seems to hang around Avril. I don't get what her deal is? What does Kevin see in her? She always wears her ugly black outfits. I said hi to her last week and she totally ignored me!
trans-unit.target: 但凯文似乎总是和艾薇儿在一起。我不明白她的意思吗？凯文在她身上看到了什么？她总是穿着难看的黑色衣服。我上周跟她打招呼，她完全不理我！

trans-unit.source: Hey dude, I really messed up today. I was kicking my ball in the library today and it accidently hit Olga in the face. Next thing I knew, she was on the floor crying and Mrs. Eliza was screaming at me!
trans-unit.target: 嘿，伙计，我今天真的搞砸了。今天我在图书馆踢球，球不小心打到了奥尔加的脸上。接下来，我知道她在地板上哭，伊丽莎太太在对我大喊大叫！

trans-unit.source: I hate school. Why do we have to sit in this building all day? I just want to go out and throw rocks over the Lonely Cliffs. I bet I can throw farther than you can!
trans-unit.target: 我讨厌上学。为什么我们必须整天坐在这栋楼里？我只想出去扔石头到孤崖上。我打赌我能比你扔得更远！

trans-unit.source: Ok hear me out. I just had an amazing idea! I was thinking we can start a secret boxing club up by the Lonely cliffs. The adults won't be able to find us there!
trans-unit.target: 好的，听我说完。我刚刚想到一个绝妙的主意！我在想我们可以在孤独的悬崖边开一个秘密的拳击俱乐部。大人在那里找不到我们！

trans-unit.source: Your dad owns the dojo right? I was thinking you can grab a couple gloves from the dojo. We will only invite kids we trust. I will be the president of the club, and you can be the helper!
trans-unit.target: 你爸爸拥有道场，对吧？我在想你可以从道场拿几副手套。我们只邀请我们信任的孩子。我将成为俱乐部的主席，你可以做助手！

trans-unit.source: Mom doesn�t want me to play Brutal Fighter Online anymore. She even took away my GameDot Console and almost grounded me! This sucks.
trans-unit.target: 妈妈不想让我再玩《野蛮斗士在线》了。她甚至拿走了我的GameDot游戏机，差点让我停飞！这太糟糕了。

trans-unit.source: I wish my parents were like yours. I can't believe you get to play Brutal Fighter any time you want.
trans-unit.target: 我希望我的父母像你一样。我简直不敢相信，你随时都可以玩《野蛮斗士》。

trans-unit.source: I saw something VERY SCARY today. I was walking past the bathhouse when I saw a ghost by the entrance! It was very dark, and it entered the bathhouse even without any lights on.
trans-unit.target: 我今天看到了一件非常可怕的事情。我正走过澡堂，突然看见门口有个鬼！天很黑，它甚至没有开灯就进了澡堂。

trans-unit.source: It's body was waving, almost like it was floating. It must be a ghost! Who would walk into a dark empty building like that? I got so scared I immediately ran back into the Library. Eliza wouldn't believe me!
trans-unit.target: 它的身体在摆动，几乎像是在漂浮。一定是鬼！谁会走进这样一座黑暗的空建筑？我吓得赶紧跑回图书馆。伊丽莎不会相信我的！

trans-unit.source: Become a pitmaster and discover new talents when cooking with a variety of meats. You can also improve you proficiency when cooking with Grills and Ovens.
trans-unit.target: 成为一名烹饪大师，在烹饪各种肉类时发现新的天赋。您还可以提高使用烤架和烤箱烹饪的熟练程度。

trans-unit.source: Master the art of vegetarian cuisine. Unlock brand new vegetarian recipes, improve your cooking speed, and improve the happiness of your guests with health-conscious cooking.
trans-unit.target: 精通素食烹饪艺术。解锁全新的素食食谱，提高您的烹饪速度，并通过注重健康的烹饪提高客人的幸福感。

trans-unit.source: Become a master of dough, and enhance the quality of your baked goods. Learn the art of ingredient management to save ingredients when cooking.
trans-unit.target: 成为面团大师，提高烘焙食品的质量。学习食材管理的艺术，在烹饪时节省食材。

trans-unit.source: Learn the art of drink mixing, and bring a new culinary dimension to the beverages you serve. Learn faster drink mixing, and improve the satisfaction of customers who try your drinks.
trans-unit.target: 学习饮料混合的艺术，为您提供的饮料带来新的烹饪维度。学习更快的饮料混合，提高尝试饮料的顾客的满意度。

trans-unit.source: Master the art of seafood cuisine, and enhance your menu with the flavors of the ocean. You can also improve you proficiency when cooking with Steamers and Friers.
trans-unit.target: 掌握海鲜烹饪艺术，用海洋的味道来丰富你的菜单。您还可以提高使用蒸锅和薯条烹饪的熟练程度。

trans-unit.source: Learn the art of molecular gastronomy and use science to produce otherworldly cuisine. You can also improve you proficiency when cooking with Stoves and Ice Cream Makers.
trans-unit.target: 学习分子美食的艺术，并利用科学制作其他世界的美食。您还可以提高使用炉灶和冰淇淋机烹饪的熟练程度。

trans-unit.source: The selected ingredients will be consumed.
Dropped ingredients will be returned to inventory.
trans-unit.target: 掉落的配料将退回库存。

trans-unit.source: View brewing recipes that you have previously discovered.
trans-unit.target: 查看您之前发现的酿造食谱。

trans-unit.source: Dropped ingredients will be returned to inventory.
trans-unit.target: 掉落的配料将退回库存。

trans-unit.source: Steam ingredients without mixing with water.
trans-unit.target: 在不与水混合的情况下蒸配料。

trans-unit.source: Mash the fruit and keep the skin.
Extract the juice without the skin.
Select the ingredients you wish to use, and choose the machine process.
trans-unit.target: 选择您要使用的成分，并选择机器工艺。

trans-unit.source: The block quality was too low.
There was not enough sulphur in the mixture.
trans-unit.target: 混合物中没有足够的硫。

trans-unit.source: You will automatically fail the daily task.
trans-unit.target: 您将自动失败日常任务。

trans-unit.source: Change to event mode. Host event :
trans-unit.target: 切换到事件模式。主办活动：

trans-unit.source: Change to regular restaurant service mode.
trans-unit.target: 切换到常规餐厅服务模式。

trans-unit.source: Change to host Critic Mode. Host food critic to improve your restaurant reputation.
trans-unit.target: 切换到主机批评模式。接待美食评论家，以提高你的餐厅声誉。

trans-unit.source: Stops all orders and force all customers to leave the restaurant immediately.
trans-unit.target: 停止所有订单，并强制所有顾客立即离开餐厅。

trans-unit.source: You will receive a reputation penalty and will not receive gratuity from remaining customers.
trans-unit.target: 您将受到声誉处罚，并且不会收到剩余客户的小费。

trans-unit.source: You will receive a reputation penalty and you will fail the task.
trans-unit.target: 你将受到声誉惩罚，你将无法完成任务。

trans-unit.source: Game will not be saved when exiting game from this scene.
trans-unit.target: 从该场景退出游戏时，游戏将不会被保存。

trans-unit.source: Game will not be saved when exiting game during restaurant service.
trans-unit.target: 在餐厅服务期间退出游戏时，游戏将不会被保存。

trans-unit.source: (name) has visited your restaurant. Check your mail on the following day to see the review.
trans-unit.target: (name)去过你的餐厅。请在第二天检查您的邮件以查看评论。

trans-unit.source: (name) visited your restaurant but there was not enough food to serve. The critic will return.
trans-unit.target: (name)参观了你的餐厅，但食物不够。评论家会回来的。
尘土飞扬的沙龙工作人员
查看尘土飞扬的沙龙工作人员

trans-unit.source: Learn -Supply Chain- skill to unlock ingredient deliveries.
trans-unit.target: 学习-供应链-解锁配料交付的技能。

trans-unit.source: You've got this! Running a restaurant is hard but remember that I'm always here for you.
trans-unit.target: 你有这个！经营一家餐馆很难，但请记住，我永远在你身边。

trans-unit.source: Your restaurant is going to be amazing! Hope this can help in some way.
trans-unit.target: 你的餐厅会很棒的！希望这能在某种程度上有所帮助。

trans-unit.source: Hey bud. Came across this the other day and thought it might help!
trans-unit.target: 嘿，伙计。前几天我偶然发现了这个，觉得它可能会有所帮助！

trans-unit.source: Sending you my best wishes and looking forward to the great success to your restaurant!
trans-unit.target: 向您致以最良好的祝愿，并期待您的餐厅取得圆满成功！

trans-unit.source: Always fun chatting with you friend. I found this the other day and thought of you.
trans-unit.target: 和朋友聊天总是很有趣。前几天我发现了这个，想到了你。

trans-unit.source: Hey (playername), looking forward to seeing you more around town. It's always been a pleasure.
trans-unit.target: 嘿(playername)，期待在城里见到你。这一直是一种乐趣。

trans-unit.source: I am happy to have met you and getting to know you more and more. And than you for always listening. Let's hang out soon!
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴认识你，越来越了解你。比你总是听。我们快点出去玩吧！

trans-unit.source: I just wanted to say how impressive the growth of Le Sequoia has been. It has had a great positive impact on White Ash Harbor. Wishing you more success!
trans-unit.target: 我只想说Le Sequoia的增长是多么令人印象深刻。它对白灰港产生了巨大的积极影响。祝你更成功！

trans-unit.source: Hi (playername), you've been a great help to me and the rest of the folks here. Feel free to drop by my home anytime if you want to chat.
trans-unit.target: 嗨(playername)，你对我和这里的其他人帮助很大。如果你想聊天，随时都可以来我家。

trans-unit.source: Hey (playername), I know you are busy but just wanted to tell you that I feel much better since meeting you. Best of luck with the restaurant!
trans-unit.target: 嘿(playername)，我知道你很忙，但我想告诉你，自从见到你以来，我感觉好多了。祝餐厅好运！

trans-unit.source: Hey dear friend. You've been incredible generous throughout our friendship. I came across this the other day and thought that you should have it. Enjoy!
trans-unit.target: 嘿，亲爱的朋友。在我们的友谊中，你一直非常慷慨。前几天我偶然发现了这个，觉得你应该拥有它。享受吧！

trans-unit.source: We haven't known each other for that long but I feel like we are like kindred spirits. Since we share a similar mind, I think you would like this.
trans-unit.target: 我们认识的时间不长，但我觉得我们志趣相投。既然我们有相似的想法，我想你会喜欢的。

trans-unit.source: Let's get together soon eh? I hope you haven't forgotten about me. Here's something to jog your memory.
trans-unit.target: 我们很快再聚吧？我希望你没有忘记我。这里有一些东西可以唤起你的记忆。

trans-unit.source: You are truly amazing. I feel that my life has really changed after becoming friends with you. Hope this can help with your restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 你真了不起。和你成为朋友后，我觉得我的生活真的改变了。希望这能对你的餐厅有所帮助。

trans-unit.source: Have this. You better give me something good next time.
trans-unit.target: 拿着这个。下次你最好给我点好东西。

trans-unit.source: It's been great knowing you over our time together. You have been incredibly helpful, and I hope I can do the same in the future. For now, I'm sending you good vibes!
trans-unit.target: 我们在一起的时候认识你真是太好了。你帮了大忙，我希望我将来也能这样做。现在，我向你发送良好的氛围！

trans-unit.source: Let's chat more often eh? Better not have found cooler friends after becoming a successful chef. You are always welcome to drop by my home!
trans-unit.target: 我们多聊聊吧？成为一名成功的厨师后，最好不要找更酷的朋友。欢迎您随时来我家做客！

trans-unit.source: Hey (playername), now that you are becoming a successful chef, I hope you won't forget about me! Remember, I know where you live!
trans-unit.target: 嘿(playername)，既然你正在成为一名成功的厨师，我希望你不要忘记我！记住，我知道你住在哪里！

trans-unit.source: Just wanted to say that it's amazing to see the growth of your restaurant. Can't wait to come eat again soon. I better get a good discount!
trans-unit.target: 我只想说，看到你的餐厅发展壮大真是太棒了。迫不及待地想很快再来吃饭。我最好得到一个很好的折扣！

trans-unit.source: I was walking by your restaurant yesterday and smelled something delicious. You'll let me try your food free of charge right? Pretty please?
trans-unit.target: 我昨天路过你的餐馆，闻到了一些美味的东西。你会让我免费尝尝你的食物，对吧？漂亮吗？

trans-unit.source: I miss you already. Can't wait to see you again.
trans-unit.target: 我已经想你了。迫不及待地想再见到你。

trans-unit.source: Remember to not overwork yourself! Hope this can take the edge off.
trans-unit.target: 记住不要过度劳累自己！希望这能缓解压力。

trans-unit.source: Miss you! Hope this can help with your work.
trans-unit.target: 想念你！希望这能对你的工作有所帮助。

trans-unit.source: Hi Darling. I can't wait to see you again. Every moment we spend brings me great happiness, and I'm always sad to see you go. Here, have this.
trans-unit.target: 嗨，亲爱的。我迫不及待地想再见到你。我们度过的每一刻都给我带来了巨大的幸福，看到你离开，我总是很难过。拿着这个。

trans-unit.source: Can't believe we are a couple! It feels like yesterday that we went on our first date. I came across this and it reminded me of you. Keep it!
trans-unit.target: 真不敢相信我们是一对！感觉就像昨天我们第一次约会。我偶然发现了这个，它让我想起了你。留着！

trans-unit.source: I was quiet bored yesterday and kept thinking of the good times we had together. You'll visit soon right?
trans-unit.target: 昨天我很无聊，一直在想我们在一起的美好时光。你很快就会来，对吧？

trans-unit.source: I keep thinking back on the dates we've had, and I'm just so happy that we agreed to continue seeing each other. Let's hope for more happy times together!
trans-unit.target: 我一直在回想我们的约会，我很高兴我们同意继续见面。让我们一起期待更多快乐的时光！

trans-unit.source: I have to admit it. You are the most attractive when in full chef gear and managing your restaurant. Maybe I'll drop by sometime ;)
trans-unit.target: 我必须承认。当你全副武装地管理你的餐厅时，你是最有魅力的。也许我什么时候会来；）

trans-unit.source: Hi sweetie. Miss you. Just wanted to tell you what an amazing job you are doing with the restaurant. I'm always here to support you if you need me.
trans-unit.target: 嗨，亲爱的。想念你。我只是想告诉你，你在这家餐厅做得多么出色。如果你需要我，我总是在这里支持你。

trans-unit.source: Thinking of you in your cute chef outfit, managing a whole restaurant and cooking up some delicious dishes . . . Whew. Anyways, see you soon ;)
trans-unit.target: 想着你穿着可爱的厨师装，管理着一整家餐厅，做着一些美味的菜肴。呼。不管怎样，很快见；）

trans-unit.source: I'm feeling the love in the air today. Can't wait to see you. Here's a gift that is worthy of my soulmate.
trans-unit.target: 我今天感觉到空气中弥漫着爱。等不及要见你了。这是一份值得我的灵魂伴侣的礼物。

trans-unit.source: Happy Valentines day (playername)! Sending lots of love, and I hope you enjoy this gift.
trans-unit.target: 情人节快乐(playername)！送上很多爱，我希望你喜欢这份礼物。

trans-unit.source: I'm so happy to share this special day with you. Every since I first met you, I've felt a spark that I've never felt in my entire life. Here's to more thrilling moments to come.
trans-unit.target: 我很高兴和你分享这个特别的日子。自从我第一次见到你，我就感受到了一种我一生中从未感受到的火花。接下来还有更多激动人心的时刻。

trans-unit.source: Hi Honey. It's Valentines day! Wishing you lots of love and looking forward to seeing you later.
trans-unit.target: 嗨，亲爱的。今天是情人节！祝你有很多爱，期待以后见到你。

trans-unit.source: (playername), you are my sunshine. Seeing your face always brightens up my day. With you at my side, I feel truly complete.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，你是我的阳光。看到你的脸总是让我心情愉悦。有你在我身边，我感到真正的完整。

trans-unit.source: (playername) darling. I feel like it's been forever since we've last been together. Hope you are doing well. Let's get together soon.
trans-unit.target: 亲爱的。我觉得我们上次在一起已经很久了。希望你做得很好。让我们很快聚在一起。

trans-unit.source: I haven't seen or heard from you in a while. I hope you are doing ok. I really miss you!
trans-unit.target: 我已经有一段时间没见到你了，也没有你的消息了。我希望你一切都好。我真的很想你！

trans-unit.source: (playername), I feel like it's been forever since you have come to see me. Where are you? Please tell me if there is something wrong. I do not understand why you are ignoring me.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，我觉得你已经很久没来看我了。你在哪里？如果有什么不对劲，请告诉我。我不明白你为什么不理我。

trans-unit.source: Hi Darling, we haven't seen each other in a long time and I am afraid that we are growing apart. Remember, my doors are always open. Please come see me when you can. I really miss you.
trans-unit.target: 嗨，亲爱的，我们好久不见了，恐怕我们正在分开。记住，我的门永远是敞开的。有空的时候请来看我。我非常想念你。

trans-unit.source: (playername), you have broken my heart. You have not spoken to me for over a month. How can you be so cruel? I do not see this relationship going anywhere. I hope you are happy with what you are doing, but I shall not be a part of it.
trans-unit.target: 你伤了我的心。你已经一个多月没跟我说话了。你怎么能这么残忍？我认为这种关系不会有任何进展。我希望你对自己正在做的事情感到满意，但我不会参与其中。

trans-unit.source: (playername), I thought that you were my true love and that we could grow old together. But I see that you do not feel the same way about me. My heart is broken, but I will get past this and find someone that appreciates me.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，我以为你是我的真爱，我们可以一起变老。但我看到你对我的感觉不一样。我的心碎了，但我会克服这一点，找到一个欣赏我的人。

trans-unit.source: Hey (playername), wishing you a happy birthday! I hope you will enjoy this.
trans-unit.target: 嘿(playername)，祝你生日快乐！我希望你会喜欢这个。

trans-unit.source: Hi friend. Happy birthday! Getting older might sometimes be stressful, but think about all of the great experiences you have accumulated over the past year. Live without regrets!
trans-unit.target: 嗨，朋友。生日快乐！变老有时可能会带来压力，但想想你在过去一年里积累的所有美好经历。活得无怨无悔！

trans-unit.source: Another year huh? Wish it's a good one for you my friend. I hope you enjoy this gift!
trans-unit.target: 又是一年？朋友，祝你好运。我希望你喜欢这份礼物！

trans-unit.source: What an eventful year. I'm happy to have a friend like you in my life. Wishing you a great birthday. Oh, and you can have this.
trans-unit.target: 多么多事之秋啊。我很高兴在我的生活中有你这样的朋友。祝你生日快乐。哦，你可以拥有这个。

trans-unit.source: Happy Birthday! Life has its ups and downs, but remember to have a positive outlook and look forward to more exciting things to come!
trans-unit.target: 生日快乐！人生有起有落，但记住要有积极的态度，期待更多激动人心的事情到来！

trans-unit.source: Happy birthday (playername). It took me a while to find this, but I think you will like it.
trans-unit.target: 生日快乐。我花了一段时间才找到这个，但我想你会喜欢的。

trans-unit.source: Happy birthday! Getting old sucks, but the best part of birthdays is getting new presents!
trans-unit.target: 生日快乐！变老很糟糕，但生日最好的部分是得到新礼物！

trans-unit.source: (playername), happy birthday! Boy have I got a great present for you. It took me a while to find this. I hope you like it!
trans-unit.target: (playername)，生日快乐！孩子，我给你准备了一份很棒的礼物。我花了一段时间才找到这个。希望你喜欢！

trans-unit.source: Happy birthday (playername). From when we first met, I've always felt like we are like kindred spirits. It makes getting gifts easier. I think you will like this.
trans-unit.target: 生日快乐。从我们第一次见面起，我就一直觉得我们志趣相投。它使获得礼物更容易。我想你会喜欢这个的。

trans-unit.source: Happy birthday to you (playername). It's a day for great celebration, so remember to take some time off work to enjoy it!
trans-unit.target: 祝你生日快乐。这是一个值得庆祝的日子，所以记得休息一段时间来享受它！

trans-unit.source: Hi (playername). I read the review of Le Sequoia. We all have these setbacks in life. What doesn't kill us makes us stronger. You can overcome this!
trans-unit.target: 嗨(playername)。我读了Le Sequoia的评论。我们生活中都有这些挫折。不能杀死我们的东西会让我们变得更强大。你可以克服这个！

trans-unit.source: Hey (playername). Just saw the first review of Le Sequoia. Don't worry about it! You are a great chef and I know Le Sequoia will become a fantastic restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 嘿(playername)。刚刚看了Le Sequoia的第一篇评论。别担心！你是一位出色的厨师，我知道Le Sequoia将成为一家出色的餐厅。

trans-unit.source: Hey (playername). It looks like the first review of Le Sequoia was quite good. I know you will continue to grow the restaurant into something spectacular.
trans-unit.target: 嘿(playername)。看来Le Sequoia的第一篇评论相当不错。我知道你会继续把这家餐厅发展成一家壮观的餐厅。

trans-unit.source: Hey (playername). The was a kickass review. I didn't realize you were such a skilled chef! I can't wait to dine at Le Sequoia soon.
trans-unit.target: 嘿(playername)。这是一篇精彩的评论。我没想到你是个如此熟练的厨师！我迫不及待地想很快在Le Sequoia用餐。

trans-unit.source: (playername), you are truly amazing. I just saw the review. Spectacular! I think this will attract more visitors to the town. I can't wait to see where you go from here.
trans-unit.target: (playername)，你真的很棒。我刚刚看了评论。壮观的！我认为这将吸引更多的游客来这个城镇。我迫不及待地想看看你接下来会去哪里。

trans-unit.source: Nestled on the waterfront of White Ash Harbor lies the restaurant Le Sequoia, a creation of the great chef Antoine Casteau. Le Sequoia has since been passed onto his student; chef (playername) and reopened with a new menu.
trans-unit.target: 坐落在白灰港海滨的 Le Sequoia 餐厅是由大厨 Antoine Casteau 创办的。Le Sequoia 餐厅后来被传给了他的学生，即厨师(playername)，并以新菜单重新开业。

trans-unit.source: Located inside the famous White Ash Harbor Bathhouse, the Peony Teahouse is a centuries old establishment that has been reopened by Chef (playername). (playername) runs the Teahouse together with its owner Aylin.
trans-unit.target: 牡丹茶馆坐落在著名的白灰港浴室内，是一家拥有百年历史的茶馆，由主厨(playername)重新开业。(playername)与其老板 Aylin 共同经营这家茶馆。

trans-unit.source: Located in the Umbra District of Billboard City, the Dusty Saloon is a lively pub opened to serve the various patrons of the city's underbelly. The clients here may disregard the law, but they do not disregard poor cuisine.
trans-unit.target: Dusty Saloon 位于 Billboard City 的 Umbra 区，是一家热闹的酒吧，专门为城市底层的各类顾客提供服务。这里的顾客可能会无视法律，但他们不会无视劣质菜肴。

trans-unit.source: Sitting in the vibrant heart of the Noda District, Neon City Cafeteria caters to the dream chasing youngsters with busy schedules. To survive in this distrcit, a restaurant must be fast-paced and innovative.
trans-unit.target: 霓虹城自助餐厅坐落在野田区充满活力的中心地带，服务于忙碌、追逐梦想的年轻人。要想在这个地区生存，餐厅必须快节奏、创新。

trans-unit.source: Sitting among the clouds atop the Starlight District, Bleu is a high-end restaurant that caters to the upper echelons of Billboard City. These elite clientelle are ruthless, and expects nothing but the best of the culinary world.
trans-unit.target: Bleu坐落在星光区的云层中，是一家高端餐厅，为Billboard City的上层人士提供服务。这些精英顾客是无情的，只期待最好的烹饪世界。

trans-unit.source: (playername) is a young chef who is a disciple of the great Antoine Casteau. Although (playername) has accomplished little in the culinary world, the trust given by Chef Casteau towards this young chef has peaked my curiosity.
trans-unit.target: (playername)是一位年轻的厨师，是伟大的安托万·卡斯托的弟子。尽管(playername)在烹饪界几乎没有什么成就，但Casteau厨师对这位年轻厨师的信任激发了我的好奇心。

trans-unit.source: (playername) will shape the identity and fate of Le Sequoia. Will this restaurant once again become a shining star?
trans-unit.target: (playername)将塑造乐红杉的身份和命运。这家餐厅会再次成为一颗闪亮的明星吗？

trans-unit.source: A disciple of Antoine Casteau, (playername) is a talented chef that who has successfully brought the once famed Le Sequoia back to life.
trans-unit.target: Antoine Casteau的弟子(playername)是一位才华横溢的厨师，他成功地让曾经著名的Le Sequoia起死回生。

trans-unit.source: On top of running a restaurant, (playername) actively helps out the locals of White Ash Harbor to revitalize this deteriorating town.
trans-unit.target: 除了经营一家餐厅，(playername)还积极帮助白灰港的当地人振兴这个不断恶化的小镇。

trans-unit.source: Chef (playername) has become a positive force in the town of White Ash Harbor, establishing (restaurant) as a gathering point for local foodies.
trans-unit.target: 厨师(playername)已成为白灰港镇的一股积极力量，将(restaurant)打造成当地美食家的聚集地。

trans-unit.source: With (playername)'s help, the famous Peony Bathhouse of White Ash Harbor has been reopened to the masses, attracting many tourists to visit the quiet seaside town.
trans-unit.target: 在(playername)的帮助下，著名的白灰港牡丹浴场重新向大众开放，吸引了许多游客参观这个安静的海滨小镇。

trans-unit.source: (restaurant) is a relatively unknown restaurant and little is known about the head chef or the food that is served here.
trans-unit.target: (restaurant)是一家相对不为人知的餐厅，人们对这里的主厨或供应的食物知之甚少。

trans-unit.source: However, even the greatest restaurants of Billboard City started from humble beginnings. As a food critic, it is my job to discover the hidden gems of the land, so that more people can share my love of food.
trans-unit.target: 然而，即使是Billboard City最伟大的餐厅也是从卑微的起点开始的。作为一名美食评论家，我的工作是发现这片土地上隐藏的宝石，这样更多的人就可以分享我对食物的热爱。

trans-unit.source: I have heard good things regarding (restaurant). The patrons that eat here have frequently given great reviews, and there has been a lot of buzz regarding the exciting menu served here.
trans-unit.target: 我听说(restaurant)很好。在这里用餐的顾客经常给予好评，这里令人兴奋的菜单也引起了很多热议。

trans-unit.source: However, I am not swayed by the mutterings of the masses. As a professional food critic, I shall give a deeper insight towards (restaurant).
trans-unit.target: 然而，我并没有被群众的抱怨所动摇。作为一名专业的美食评论家，我将对(restaurant)有更深入的了解。

trans-unit.source: (restaurant) has established itself as popular eatery among locals, and has become well known as a reliable destination for a good meal.
trans-unit.target: (restaurant)已经成为当地人中受欢迎的餐馆，并被誉为一个可靠的美食目的地。

trans-unit.source: Although (playername) has not yet reached the peaks claimed by the great chefs of Billboard City, the rising notoriety of (restaurant) has begun to spread among the connoisseurs of delicious food.
trans-unit.target: 尽管(playername)尚未达到Billboard City伟大厨师所宣称的顶峰，但(restaurant)日益臭名昭著的名声已经开始在美食鉴赏家中传播。

trans-unit.source: Chef (playername) has turned (restaurant) into a foodie hotspot, bringing more and more visitors to (city) each day.
trans-unit.target: 厨师 (playername)已经把(restaurant)变成了一个美食热点，每天都有越来越多的游客来(city)。

trans-unit.source: The guests that have eaten here have spoken of an incredible menu, utilizing the freshest ingredients of the land. I am very excited to dine here. Will (restaurant) live up to the hype?
trans-unit.target: 在这里吃过饭的客人谈到了一份令人难以置信的菜单，使用了这片土地上最新鲜的食材。我很兴奋能在这里吃饭。(restaurant)会辜负炒作吗？

trans-unit.source: (restaurant) needs no introduction. It has become a household name and foodies from all over the world flock to (city) to dine here.
trans-unit.target: (restaurant)不需要介绍。它已经成为一个家喻户晓的名字，来自世界各地的美食家蜂拥而至(city)在这里用餐。

trans-unit.source: I have butterflies when I arrive on the front steps. What kind of culinary delights await past these doors? What magic awaits me? My heart is pounding when I enter.
trans-unit.target: 当我走到前面的台阶上时，我感到很紧张。这些门后等待着什么样的美食？什么魔法在等着我？我进去的时候心跳加速。

trans-unit.source: Upon entering (restaurant), I immediately noticed a lack of attention to detail towards the decor.
trans-unit.target: 一走进(restaurant)，我立刻注意到对装饰细节缺乏关注。

trans-unit.source: The furniture and decorations were drab and uninspired, resulting in an uninviting atmosphere.
trans-unit.target: 家具和装饰品单调乏味，缺乏灵感，营造出一种不讨人喜欢的氛围。

trans-unit.source: The interior design of (restaurant) was generally nice and clean, if a bit generic.
trans-unit.target: (restaurant)的室内设计总体上很好，很干净，虽然有点普通。

trans-unit.source: Aesthetics were clearly not the focus here. Let's hope the food is more exciting than the atmosphere.
trans-unit.target: 美学显然不是这里的重点。让我们希望食物比氛围更令人兴奋。

trans-unit.source: The interior of (restaurant) was quite nice, with clearly some effort spent towards the decor.
trans-unit.target: (restaurant)的内部相当不错，显然在装饰上花了一些功夫。

trans-unit.source: The good-looking interior has put my in a pleasant mood as I am seated at my table.
trans-unit.target: 当我坐在餐桌旁时，漂亮的内饰让我心情愉悦。

trans-unit.source: Upon entering (restaurant), I was greeted by a beautifully decorated interior.
trans-unit.target: 一走进(restaurant)，我就看到了装饰精美的内部。

trans-unit.source: The chairs and tables meshed well with the colors of the decorations. I could just sit here and relax all day!
trans-unit.target: 椅子和桌子与装饰品的颜色很协调。我可以坐在这里放松一整天！

trans-unit.source: When I entered (restaurant), I was blown away. This is one of the most beautiful interiors I had ever seen.
trans-unit.target: 当我走进(restaurant)时，我被吹走了。这是我见过的最漂亮的内饰之一。

trans-unit.source: It felt like I had entered a magical new world. One that is beyond words to describe it.
trans-unit.target: 感觉就像我进入了一个神奇的新世界。一个无法用言语形容的。

trans-unit.source: The menu of (restaurant) contained a nice selection of dishes.
trans-unit.target: (restaurant)的菜单上有各种各样的菜肴。

trans-unit.source: Surprisingly, (restaurant) featured a completely vegan menu.
trans-unit.target: 令人惊讶的是，(restaurant)的菜单完全是纯素食。

trans-unit.source: Unfortunately, the menu of (restaurant) was highly simplistic and uninspired. There was little effort put into breaking away from generic recipes that home cooks can make.
trans-unit.target: 不幸的是，(restaurant)的菜单非常简单，缺乏灵感。很少有人努力摆脱家庭厨师可以制作的通用食谱。

trans-unit.source: I was slightly disappointed by the simplicity of each dish, and was hoping to see some experimentation with ingredients. Chef (playername) played it very safe with the menu.
trans-unit.target: 我对每道菜的简单性感到有点失望，希望看到一些食材的实验。厨师(playername)对菜单非常谨慎。

trans-unit.source: The menu of (restaurant) was quite unique, and the efforts and experimentation of Chef (playername) shows through the dishes served here.
trans-unit.target: (restaurant)的菜单非常独特，厨师(playername)的努力和实验体现在这里提供的菜肴中。

trans-unit.source: (restaurant) possesses a very innovative menu, utilizing ingredients in surprising ways. Chef (playername) clearly demonstrates a love for pushing towards new horizons in food.
trans-unit.target: (restaurant)拥有非常创新的菜单，以令人惊讶的方式使用食材。厨师(playername)清楚地表明了他对推动食物走向新境界的热爱。

trans-unit.source: The menu of (restaurant) displayed innovations that I could not have imagined. Every dish was incredibly complex, and utilized ingredients with suprising ingenuity.
trans-unit.target: (restaurant)的菜单展示了我无法想象的创新。每道菜都非常复杂，食材的巧妙运用令人惊讶。

trans-unit.source: The overall quality of the dishes was surprisingly poor. The chef showed very little care towards creating food that tastes good. Instead, the dishes were bland and often overcooked.
trans-unit.target: 菜肴的整体质量令人惊讶地差。厨师对创造美味的食物表现得很少。相反，这些菜味道平淡，而且经常煮过头。

trans-unit.source: The food tasted ok. It wasn't bad, but it didn't taste great either. It's like eating the food of a generic diner chain. Definitely not suitable for the culinary battleground that is Billboard City.
trans-unit.target: 食物味道还可以。还不错，但味道也不太好。这就像吃普通连锁餐厅的食物。绝对不适合Billboard City这个烹饪战场。

trans-unit.source: The dishes were well made, and quite enjoyable. However, the food isn't anything special and needs a lot more improvement in order to compete with the best restaurants.
trans-unit.target: 这些菜做得很好，很好吃。然而，食物并没有什么特别的，需要更多的改进才能与最好的餐厅竞争。

trans-unit.source: The dishes were cooked perfectly and were absolutely delicious. I still cannot stop thinking about the menu, hours after I have left the restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 这些菜煮得很好，绝对美味。离开餐厅几个小时后，我仍然无法停止思考菜单。

trans-unit.source: The food in (restaurant) was extraordinary. Every dish was perfectly seasoned and possessed wonderful flavors that were out of this world. What a delight!
trans-unit.target: (restaurant)的食物非同寻常。每一道菜都经过了完美的调味，拥有无与伦比的美味。真高兴！

trans-unit.source: None of the dishes were satisfying enough for me to pick a favorite. However, if I am forced to choose, it would have to be the (dishName).
trans-unit.target: 没有一道菜让我满意到可以挑一道最喜欢的。但是，如果我必须选择，它应该是(dishName)。

trans-unit.source: This would be the best choice for those who wish not to vomit out their meal immediately after consumption.
trans-unit.target: 对于那些不想在进食后立即呕吐的人来说，这将是最好的选择。

trans-unit.source: There was nothing special about the food here, however I would say that the (dishName) was moderately well prepared.
trans-unit.target: 这里的食物没什么特别的，但我想说(dishName)准备得相当好。

trans-unit.source: The saving grace was the way it utilized the natural flavors of (ingredient1), resulting in a somewhat decent dish.
trans-unit.target: 这道菜的独特之处在于它利用了(ingredient1)的天然风味，从而做出了一道还算不错的菜。

trans-unit.source: The standout dish was the (dishName), which was the most flavorful and memorable.
trans-unit.target: 最突出的菜是(dishName)，它是最美味、最令人难忘的。

trans-unit.source: Its use of (ingredient1) was well thought-out and complimented the (ingredient 2) quite nicely. I can see myself coming back here just to eat the (dishName).
trans-unit.target: 它对(ingredient1)的使用经过深思熟虑，并很好地补充了(ingredient 2)。我可以想象自己回到这里只是为了吃(dishName)。

trans-unit.source: I was absolutely in love with the (dishName), which stood out above the other dishes. The use of (ingredient1) the was the core it's flavors.
trans-unit.target: 我深深地爱上了(dishName)，它在其他菜肴中脱颖而出。(ingredient1)的使用是其风味的核心。

trans-unit.source: The use of (ingredient2) further brought the (dishType) to life, resulting in an unforgettable taste that still lingers in my mouth.
trans-unit.target: (ingredient2)的使用使(dishType)更加生动，产生了一种难忘的味道，至今仍萦绕在我的嘴里。

trans-unit.source: Despite an amazing menu, one dish stood out to me above the rest. This dish would be the (dishName), which possessed extraordinary flavours.
trans-unit.target: 尽管菜单很棒，但有一道菜让我印象深刻。这道菜就是(dishName)，味道非凡。

trans-unit.source: When I took my first taste, there was a feeling of pure magic. In all my years of reviewing food, this dish was one of the greatest I have tasted.
trans-unit.target: 当我第一次品尝时，有一种纯粹的魔法感。在我多年的美食回顾中，这道菜是我尝过的最美味的菜之一。

trans-unit.source: The service at (restaurant) was truly abysmal. I waited over an hour to receive each course. I was so hungry, I almost passed out!
trans-unit.target: (restaurant)的服务真是糟糕透顶。我等了一个多小时才收到每门课程。我饿极了，差点昏过去！

trans-unit.source: How can a fine dining establishment offer such poor service? I would expect this from the dregs of generic restaurant chains, but not from (restaurant).
trans-unit.target: 一家高档餐厅怎么能提供如此糟糕的服务？我希望这来自普通连锁餐厅的渣滓，而不是(restaurant)。

trans-unit.source: The speed of service was very poor. I waited over 40 minutes for each course to be served. I was so hungry, I almost ordered pizza to be delivered into the restaurant!
trans-unit.target: 服务速度很差。我等了40多分钟才上完每道菜。我饿极了，差点点了披萨送到餐厅！

trans-unit.source: Chef (playername) needs to bring on more staff if the restaurant is to survive.
trans-unit.target: 如果餐厅要生存下去，厨师(playername)需要雇佣更多的员工。

trans-unit.source: The service at (restaurant) was decent, and I waited a reasonable amount of time to receive my food. The staff were alert and attentive, and showed a good level of professionalism.
trans-unit.target: (restaurant)的服务还不错，我等了相当长的时间才收到食物。工作人员机敏周到，表现出良好的专业水平。

trans-unit.source: But there is always room for improvement, especially if (restaurant) is to become a renowned restaurant.
trans-unit.target: 但总有改进的余地，尤其是如果(restaurant)要成为一家著名的餐厅。

trans-unit.source: The service was fantastic, and the food arrived relatively quickly. The staff were very enthusiastic and friendly, which made the dining expereince better.
trans-unit.target: 服务太棒了，食物来得比较快。工作人员热情友好，用餐体验更好。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the food, enjoying a meal with this kind of service would be a great experience for anyone.
trans-unit.target: 无论食物如何，享受这种服务对任何人来说都是一次很棒的体验。

trans-unit.source: The service at (restaurant) was one of the best I had ever seen, even among the top ranked restaurants of Billboard City.
trans-unit.target: (restaurant)的服务是我见过的最好的餐厅之一，即使在Billboard City排名靠前的餐厅中也是如此。

trans-unit.source: The staff were attentive, graceful, and fiercely professional. Watching the staff members work was like watching ballet performance at the Starlight Theatre.
trans-unit.target: 工作人员细心、优雅，非常专业。看着工作人员工作就像在星光剧院看芭蕾舞表演。

trans-unit.source: Overall, my experience at (restaurant) was mediocre. I cannot for the life of me foresee a positive future for (restaurant) and any patrons that dine here.
trans-unit.target: 总的来说，我在(restaurant)的体验一般。我无论如何都无法预见(restaurant)和在这里用餐的任何顾客的积极未来。

trans-unit.source: Perhaps Chef (playername) will pick up the slack in the future and provide a better dining experience. However, at the present, I would not recommend anyone to dine at (restaurant) if you possess any sense of taste.
trans-unit.target: 也许厨师(playername)将来会填补空白，提供更好的用餐体验。然而，目前，如果你有任何味觉，我不会推荐任何人去(restaurant)吃饭。

trans-unit.source: Overall, my experience at (restaurant) was generally good, with some minor blemishes. Chef (playername) is clearly a diamond in the rough, but a talented chef nonetheless.
trans-unit.target: 总的来说，我在(restaurant)的体验总体上很好，有一些小瑕疵。厨师(playername)显然是一颗未经雕琢的钻石，但仍然是一位才华横溢的厨师。

trans-unit.source: I am moderately curious to see where (playername) takes (restaurant) in the near future. For now, it is a decent restaurant for a casual meal, but not a place to enjoy excellent cuisine.
trans-unit.target: 我有点好奇(playername)在不久的将来会去哪里(restaurant)。就目前而言，这是一家不错的休闲餐厅，但不是一个享受美味佳肴的地方。

trans-unit.source: Overall, I had a great time at (restaurant) and Chef (playername) shows great promise as a future innovator in the culinary world.
trans-unit.target: 总的来说，我在(restaurant)度过了一段美好的时光，厨师(playername)作为烹饪界的未来创新者展现出了巨大的潜力。

trans-unit.source: I think Chef Casteau would be proud of his protege rising to such heights. I look forward to seeing what (playername) accomplishes in the future, and I am very excited come back to (restaurant) for another taste of its menu.
trans-unit.target: 我想Casteau厨师会为他的门生升到这样的高度而感到自豪。我期待着看到(playername)未来的成就，我很高兴回到(restaurant)再次品尝它的菜单。

trans-unit.source: Overall, I had an excellent experience at (restaurant) and the taste of its delicious menu still lingers in my mouth. I felt sad when my stomach was full, because I wanted to try so much more!
trans-unit.target: 总的来说，我在(restaurant)度过了一段美好的时光，它美味的菜单的味道仍然萦绕在我的嘴里。当我吃饱的时候，我感到很难过，因为我想尝试更多！

trans-unit.source: (restaurant) is shaping up to be one of the top restaurants of the region and Chef (playername) is truly a star in the making!
trans-unit.target: (restaurant)即将成为该地区的顶级餐厅之一，主厨(playername)无疑是一颗冉冉升起的新星！

trans-unit.source: My experience at (restaurant) was one of the greatest dining experiences I had ever enjoyed, and every minute inside felt like magic. I felt like Alice adventuring through Wonderland!
trans-unit.target: 我在(restaurant)的经历是我所享受过的最棒的用餐体验之一，在里面的每一分钟都感觉像魔法。我感觉就像爱丽丝在仙境探险！

trans-unit.source: The food had surprising twists and turns, and the service by the staff was impeccable. I am excited to return to (restaurant) as soon as possible for another adventure.
trans-unit.target: 食物的制作过程令人惊喜，员工的服务也无可挑剔。我非常期待能尽快回到(restaurant)体验另一次冒险。
